com.mindfusion.scheduling

Class ItemEditContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.scheduling.ItemEditContext

  • public class ItemEditContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides information about an item when it is being in-place edited.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accept()
      Accepts the changes made on the item during the in-place editing.
      void cancel()
      Cancels the in-place editing mode.
      java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
      Gets the rectangle bounding the item contents.
      Calendar getCalendar()
      Gets the Calendar component, associated with the item.
      boolean getIsHorizontal()
      Gets a value indicating the item's orientation.
      Item getItem()
      Gets the item that is being edited.
      int getTextAlignment()
      Gets the alignment of the text of the item being edited.
      java.awt.Font getTextFont()
      Gets the font of the text of the item being edited.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        public void accept()
        Description copied from class: ItemEditContext
        Accepts the changes made on the item during the in-place editing.

        Invoke this method when the user has confirmed the in-place editing of an item through the custom editor control.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Description copied from class: ItemEditContext
        Cancels the in-place editing mode.

        Invoke this method when the user has canceled the in-place editing of an item through the custom editor control.

      • getCalendar

        public Calendar getCalendar()
        Description copied from class: ItemEditContext
        Gets the Calendar component, associated with the item.
        Returns:
        A Calendar object.

      • getItem

        public Item getItem()
        Description copied from class: ItemEditContext
        Gets the item that is being edited.
        Returns:
        An Item object.

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
        Description copied from class: ItemEditContext
        Gets the rectangle bounding the item contents.

        The item is painted inside these bounds, so the custom editor should be displayed in them or near them.

        Returns:
        A Rectangle object.

      • getIsHorizontal

        public boolean getIsHorizontal()
        Description copied from class: ItemEditContext
        Gets a value indicating the item's orientation.

        Items are painted horizontally or vertically depending on the orientation of the current view.

        Returns:
        true if the item is painted horizontally; otherwise, false.

      • getTextAlignment

        public int getTextAlignment()
        Description copied from class: ItemEditContext
        Gets the alignment of the text of the item being edited.

        This value corresponds to the Style.getTextAlignment() of the style associated with the item being edited.

        Returns:
        One of the TextAlignment constants.

      • getTextFont

        public java.awt.Font getTextFont()
        Description copied from class: ItemEditContext
        Gets the font of the text of the item being edited.
        Returns:
        A Font object.
